http://arxiv.org/abs/1602.04943v1@Twisted Novikov homology of complex hypersurface complements@['Stefan Friedl'
column2: 'Laurentiu Maxim']@"We study the twisted Novikov homology of the complement of a complex

column1: hypersurface in general position at infinity. We give a self-contained
topological proof of the vanishing (except possibly in the middle degree) of
the twisted Novikov homology groups associated to positive cohomology classes
of degree one defined on the complement."@2016

then it is isomorphic to a subgroup of SO(3)."@2016
